title: More logic is needed to handle disk sorting when there is a border value for row value
EB: When there is a border value for the row value, the current logic for processing disk sorting is not sufficient. A better logic should be implemented where the data is sorted directly in memory and then written to the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Sort the data on disk using the program
2. Make sure the program processes less than 40000 rows of data
3. Observe the following operations: 
   a. The file is saved as a temp file
   b. The file is loaded into memory
   c. The data is sorted
   d. The sorted file is saved as a temp file
